titles.title: A resolution honoring United States Army Special Operations Command on their 20th anniversary.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: 12/22/2009--Introduced. Commends the U.S. Army Special Operations Command for more than 20 years of dedicated service to our nation. Honors the more than 27,000 personnel who serve in the Command Pledges continued support for the men and women of the U.S. Armed Forces.
